line_1: A pint an' gill I'd gie them baith,
line_2: Then up I gat, an swoor an aith,

line_1: A pint an' gill I'd gie them baith,
line_2: Tho' I should pawn my pleugh an' graith,

line_1: A pint an' gill I'd gie them baith,
line_2: Or die a cadger pownie's death,

line_1: I lea'e my blessin wi' you baith:
line_2: And now, my bairns, wi' my last breath,
